mapper.sql: WITH writer_reports AS (SELECT SUBMITTER_ID_FK, FROM_SITE, TO_SITE, ITEM FROM drive_report_tb WHERE WRITER_ID_FK = ${writerIdFk} ORDER BY DRIVE_REPORT_ID DESC LIMIT 50 )
mapper.select: SELECT COMPANY FROM submitter_tb WHERE SUBMITTER_ID IN (SELECT SUBMITTER_ID_FK FROM writer_reports) GROUP BY COMPANY LIMIT 10
SELECT FROM_SITE FROM writer_reports GROUP BY FROM_SITE HAVING FROM_SITE != '' LIMIT 10
SELECT TO_SITE FROM writer_reports GROUP BY TO_SITE HAVING TO_SITE != '' LIMIT 10
SELECT ITEM FROM writer_reports GROUP BY ITEM HAVING ITEM != '' LIMIT 10
SELECT TEL FROM submitter_tb WHERE SUBMITTER_ID IN (SELECT SUBMITTER_ID_FK FROM writer_reports) GROUP BY TEL LIMIT 10
mapper.sql: WITH join_reports AS (SELECT * FROM drive_report_tb INNER JOIN submitter_tb on drive_report_tb.SUBMITTER_ID_FK = submitter_tb.SUBMITTER_ID WHERE WRITER_ID_FK = ${writerIdFk} ORDER BY DRIVE_REPORT_ID DESC )
